...and other exciting adjectives! It's a double RAM offer! 

<B>PLEASE NOTE:</B> We are moving datacenters the first week of May. We are anticipating a 4 hour downtime window, and your IP address will change when this occurs. If this is not acceptable to you, please refrain from ordering til our next sale.

Adam and I have been doing Internet services since 2003 as Digital Design Core. We moved into the VPS market in May of 2011 as IPXcore. We started this because we were on a BurstNET node that kept getting oversold, and we were unable to get any form of support. We decided that we could do better.

All of our nodes are located at Phoenix Internet in Phoenix, AZ, and transited through a mix of twtelecom and Qwest/Centurylink. Many of our Asian customers tell us they get great connectivity on this mix.

We're running OpenVZ virtualization on our very own Dell and HP Opteron-powered hardware.

<B>PLEASE NOTE</B> At this time, each connection is limited to 20 mbit/sec. Your VPS will be able to pull multiple 20 mbit/sec connections. When we move, this restriction will be lifted. Additionally, we will be unlocking CPU limits.
